IP2026_4_syn_1:
Indication: Mediastinal adenopathy.
Procedure: EBUS 11R.
- Sampled 11Ri (6 passes) and 11Rs (5 passes).
- ROSE: Benign lymphocytes.
- Flow cytometry sent.
No complications.
IP2026_4_syn_2: PROCEDURE: The patient underwent EBUS-TBNA for evaluation of right hilar adenopathy. The right interlobar station (11R) was interrogated. Separate samples were obtained from the inferior (11Ri) and superior (11Rs) aspects of the station. A total of 11 passes were completed. Rapid interpretation was negative for malignancy. Tissue was submitted for flow cytometry.
IP2026_4_syn_3:
Code: 31652 (1-2 stations).
Target: Station 11R (Right Interlobar).
Details: Sampling performed at two distinct sites within the station (11Ri and 11Rs).
Passes: 6 at 11Ri, 5 at 11Rs.
Justification: Despite two sampling sites, location maps to a single IASLC station (11R).
IP2026_4_syn_4:
Procedure: EBUS
Target: 11R.
Steps:
1. GA/LMA.
2. Normal airway.
3. Found 11Ri -> 6 biopsies.
4. Found 11Rs -> 5 biopsies.
5. ROSE neg for cancer.
6. Sent for flow.
IP2026_4_syn_5: ebus for hilar nodes... patient under general. airway looked fine. found the 11R station sampled the inferior part 11ri 6 times then the superior part 11rs 5 times. path said just lymphocytes no cancer. sent for flow cytometry. patient stable.
IP2026_4_syn_6: Mediastinal adenopathy. General Anesthesia. LMA used. Airway exam normal. EBUS scope introduced. 11Ri lymph node id[REDACTED] and sampled (6 passes). 11Rs lymph node id[REDACTED] and sampled (5 passes). ROSE negative for malignancy. Samples sent for flow and routine cytology. No bleeding.
IP2026_4_syn_7:
[Indication]
Mediastinal adenopathy.
[Anesthesia]
General.
[Description]
EBUS-TBNA of station 11R. Sampled inferior (11Ri) and superior (11Rs) aspects. 11 total passes. ROSE negative. Flow sent.
[Plan]
Outpatient follow-up.
IP2026_4_syn_8: We proceeded with EBUS to evaluate the right hilar region. We id[REDACTED] adenopathy at station 11R. To be thorough, we sampled both the inferior aspect (11Ri) and the superior aspect (11Rs) of this station, performing a total of 11 needle passes. The on-site pathologist saw lymphocytes but no malignancy. We submitted the samples for flow cytometry to rule out lymphoma.
IP2026_4_syn_9:
Indications: Adenopathy.
Action: Station 11R was targeted. Aspiration was performed at 11Ri and 11Rs. ROSE indicated absence of malignancy. Specimens were submitted for flow cytometry.
